data.eml:eml: Review of fungus-feeding urothripine species from China, with descriptions of two new species (Thysanoptera: Phlaeothripidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tong, Xiaoli, Zhao, Chao (2017): Review of fungus-feeding urothripine species from China, with descriptions of two new species (Thysanoptera: Phlaeothripidae). Zootaxa 4237 (2): 307-320, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4237.2.5
